00007 namespace OEngine {
00008 namespace GUI
00009 {
00013   class Layout
00014   {
00015   public:
00016     Layout(const std::string & _layout, MyGUI::WidgetPtr _parent = nullptr)
00017       : mMainWidget(nullptr)
00018     { initialise(_layout, _parent); }
00019     virtual ~Layout() { shutdown();  }
00020 
00021     template <typename T>
00022     void getWidget(T * & _widget, const std::string & _name, bool _throw = true)
00023     {
00024       _widget = nullptr;
00025       for (MyGUI::VectorWidgetPtr::iterator iter=mListWindowRoot.begin();
00026            iter!=mListWindowRoot.end(); ++iter)
00027         {
00028           MyGUI::WidgetPtr find = (*iter)->findWidget(mPrefix + _name);
00029           if (nullptr != find)
00030             {
00031               T * cast = find->castType<T>(false);
00032               if (nullptr != cast)
00033                 _widget = cast;
00034               else if (_throw)
00035                 {
00036                   MYGUI_EXCEPT("Error cast : dest type = '" << T::getClassTypeName()
00037                                << "' source name = '" << find->getName()
00038                                << "' source type = '" << find->getTypeName() << "' in layout '" << mLayoutName << "'");
00039                 }
00040               return;
00041             }
00042         }
00043       MYGUI_ASSERT( ! _throw, "widget name '" << _name << "' in layout '" << mLayoutName << "' not found.");
00044     }
00045 
00046     void initialise(const std::string & _layout,
00047                     MyGUI::WidgetPtr _parent = nullptr)
00048     {
00049       const std::string MAIN_WINDOW = "_Main";
00050       mLayoutName = _layout;
00051 
00052       if (mLayoutName.empty())
00053         mMainWidget = _parent;
00054       else
00055         {
00056           mPrefix = MyGUI::utility::toString(this, "_");
00057           mListWindowRoot = MyGUI::LayoutManager::getInstance().loadLayout(mLayoutName, mPrefix, _parent);
00058 
00059           const std::string main_name = mPrefix + MAIN_WINDOW;
00060           for (MyGUI::VectorWidgetPtr::iterator iter=mListWindowRoot.begin(); iter!=mListWindowRoot.end(); ++iter)
00061             {
00062               if ((*iter)->getName() == main_name)
00063                 {
00064                   mMainWidget = (*iter);
00065                   break;
00066                 }
00067             }
00068           MYGUI_ASSERT(mMainWidget, "root widget name '" << MAIN_WINDOW << "' in layout '" << mLayoutName << "' not found.");
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072     void shutdown()
00073     {
00074       MyGUI::LayoutManager::getInstance().unloadLayout(mListWindowRoot);
00075       mListWindowRoot.clear();
00076     }
00077 
00078     void setCoord(int x, int y, int w, int h)
00079     {
00080       mMainWidget->setCoord(x,y,w,h);
00081     }
00082 
00083     void setVisible(bool b)
00084     {
00085       mMainWidget->setVisible(b);
00086     }
00087 
00088     void setText(const std::string& name, const std::string& caption)
00089     {
00090       MyGUI::WidgetPtr pt;
00091       getWidget(pt, name);
00092       pt->setCaption(caption);
00093     }
00094 
00095     void setTextColor(const std::string& name, float r, float g, float b)
00096     {
00097       MyGUI::WidgetPtr pt;
00098       getWidget(pt, name);
00099       MyGUI::StaticText *st = dynamic_cast<MyGUI::StaticText*>(pt);
00100       if(st != NULL)
00101         st->setTextColour(MyGUI::Colour(b,g,r));
00102     }
00103 
00104     void setImage(const std::string& name, const std::string& imgName)
00105     {
00106       MyGUI::StaticImagePtr pt;
00107       getWidget(pt, name);
00108       pt->setImageTexture(imgName);
00109     }
00110 
00111   protected:
00112 
00113     MyGUI::WidgetPtr mMainWidget;
00114     std::string mPrefix;

00116     MyGUI::VectorWidgetPtr mListWindowRoot;
00117   };
